replies.bodyText:
Is there a reason WANDScorer is only used for TOP_DOCS before?

Mostly because it's a bit slower since it needs to track two priority queues and one linked list, when the simple DisjunctionScorer only needs to track a single priority queue.

since WANDScorer can already handle the case where minShouldMatch == 0, then I can see MinShouldMatchSumScorer be merged into WANDScorer mostly to handle non-scoring mode

+1 to give it a try in a follow-up PR!
replies.author: jpountz
